title: Is Taylor Swift the most famous singer right now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly Speaking as of right now! My Answer is NO. She is in Top-3 considering views of 2019–2020. She is in the most famous list from 2017. On 24 July,2020, Taylor Swift released her eighth studio album, ‘Folklore’, which was announced fewer than 24 hours before release. It was Written and recorded while Swift was in isolation due to the COVID-19 Corona pandemic, the album included musical collaborations with Bon Iver, Aaron Dessner, and Jack Antonoff.  (Taylor Swift during her Speak Now World Music Tour in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania United States in 2011) Song Folklore received widespread good reviews from critics, who praised Taylor Swift's indie & folk transition, storytelling, and lyricism. The album sold 2 million copies worldwide in its first week, 1.4 million of which were sold on its first day alone. Taylor Swift also broke the record for first-day album streams by a female artist on Spotify with over 80.7 million streams. You might find this interesting:  Dr. P. K. Mahanandia, is an Indian born Swedish artist famous for his journey by a 2nd hand bicycle from New Delhi to Gothenburg, to meet the love of his life, in Sweden.  Secret & Bizarre facts about Kanye West.

Honestly, she probably is. I no longer pay much attention to what goes on outside the things that directly affect my life so I can’t say yes for sure. But based on what I do know about what’s going on, I think Taylor Swift is the most famous singer right now.
